name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Network Engineer with over 10 years of experience in cloud infrastructure and network design. Proficient in managing and optimizing networks utilizing **AWS**, **Azure**, and **OCI** services, as well as implementing security protocols with **Palo Alto**, **Fortinet**, **Cisco**, and **F5** technologies. Strong understanding of networking fundamentals including **TCP/IP**, **BGP**, and VPN configurations. Known for delivering reliable, scalable solutions in high-stress environments and contributing to large-scale projects at leading organizations. Adept at technical documentation, change management, and client communication, ensuring seamless knowledge transfer and troubleshooting processes.
